channel.title: Aztec on Casa de JuJu
channel.description: Recent content in Aztec on Casa de JuJu

item.title: Xochipilli in temicxoch
item.author: mail@juju.casa (JuJu Darío)
item.description: Xochipilli , the Aztec god of beauty, youth, love, passion, sex, sexuality, fertility, arts, song, music, dance, painting, writing, games, playfulness, nature, vegetation, and flowers, is here depicted in a state referred to as temicxoch, or “dream flowers,” which symbolizes an entheogenic experience.
